message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by many of our customers. I believe it could be beneficial for you too. I'm offering it at $120 for this round.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After considering your proposal, I am willing to accept a price of $105 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $100 for the product.
